text:
Hello,

i'd like to contribute attached patch which adds support for "xsl-region-
before", "xsl-region-after" and fo:page-number tag.

Thanks
Peter Herweg
creator: pherweg@web.de
pherweg@web.de
text:
Created attachment 8293
adds support for "xsl-region-before", "xsl-region-after" and fo:page-number tag

creator: vic@outfitr.com
text: I have committed this change and some subsequent style changes. Thanks Peter!
